title: We need a new Offense/Defense hybrid item Riot

replies.body:
Spear of Gelerdria

{{item:1031}}  Chain Vest (750g) + {{item:1037}}  Pickaxe (875g) + 725g = 2350g
+40 attack damage
+50 armor

Unique Active: Next basic attack inflicts an extra physical damage of 50% of the user total AD and cause Grievous Wounds on target champion for 3 seconds (60 Second CD). (8 second window)

Melee users gain 75 range to the empowered basic atk.

This to fill in some way the previous Executioner Calling item.
Me too, Actually  we don't have and ad+armor item and a Morellonomicon physical component. so this item fit both of the  2 in only one.
Vlad and Swain suffer a lot with a item like this
Maybe the price can be re-adjust but the core idea its the same.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Atma%27s_Impaler

we had one and it was OP on bruisers.

Look, I'll be honest here.

ADCs and bruisers would abuse the shit out of it. Want {{champion:254}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:421}} to dominate again (okay, they're fun and cool to play with and against, but pretty damn strong last season)?

Something like this:

The shield values can be tweak but the main problem is no that... The real problem is that {{champion:24}}  says: heellooooo!!!
